name: Sprout's Journey
description:
"Sprout's Journey" is a 3D platformer, adventure game where you play as a sprout on a mission to save its fellow sprouts from a devastating forest fire. As the sprout, you will journey through the forest and jump over obstacles as you search for the runaway sprouts. With the guidance of the Starter NPC, you will also practice your jumping skills to make sure you're ready for the rescue mission.

Note: Game has been made for GGJ23. Has performance issues and no main menu.
